description:
小编导读：世界天花板千千万，世界最美天花板可不多，快一睹风姿。

1.Castello di Sammezzano, Leccio, Italy1.意大利莱星“被废弃的城堡”

The mesmerising ceiling, vaults and decor of the Peacock Room in this abandoned Italian palazzo near Florence speak for themselves.意大利佛罗伦萨这座废弃的宫殿里，孔雀厅的天花板、拱顶和装饰绚丽迷人，不言而喻。

Although the aristocratic Italian architect、never visited the Levant or the Orient, he imagined a world of exquisite and highly exotic forms and colours.尽管意大利贵族建筑师从未走访过东方，他想象出精美又极富与域风情的形式与色彩。

2. Ely Cathedral, Cambridgeshire2.剑桥伊利大教堂

Completed in 1334 by the royal carpenter William Hurley, the exquisite timber lantern over the central octagonal tower of Ely Cathedral is one of the greatest feats of medieval structural engineering and design.1334年由皇家木匠威廉赫尔利完工，精美的木质灯笼挂在伊利大教堂的中央八角塔上，这是中世纪结构工程和设计最美的盛宴之一。

3. Solna Centrum Metro Station, Stockholm3.斯德哥尔摩索尔纳中枢地铁站

Artists Anders Åberg and Karl-Olov Björk painted the exposed bedrock of the underground concourse a thrilling and beautifully lit night-time red. Riding the escalators here is like being drawn into some mythical sorcerer's cave.安德斯·博格语与卡尔·欧立夫·比约克涂抹了地铁大厅暴露在外的基岩，绘成炫美又激动人心的夜色亮红。在此乘扶梯就像被吸进了神秘巫师的洞穴。

4. Grand Central Station, New York4.纽约纽约中央火车站

The ceiling was based on medieval astronomical maps. The signs of the zodiac were outlined in gold leaf on a blue-green backdrop evoking autumn and winter night skies of Greece and Southern Italy.天花板是根据中世纪的天文地图绘制的。黄道十二宫图的星象在金色的叶子里勾画出来，背景为蓝绿色，希腊与意大利南部秋冬的夜空呼之欲出。

5. Shah Mosque, Isfahan5.伊斯法罕国王清真寺

Designed by the master calligrapher and miniaturist Rezza Abbasi, the blue, yellow, turquoise, pink and green tiles catch and reflect the light of this bright and hot city, animating cool spaces under the great blue dome of Abbas's mosque.由书法与微雕大师雷查阿巴西设计，这座城市明亮火热，蓝色、黄色、蓝绿、粉红和绿色的砖瓦抓住了城市之光，把阿巴斯清真寺蓝顶之下的酷爽空间展现得活灵活现。

6.Haesley Nine Bridges Golf Club House, Yeoju-gun, South Korea6.韩国骊州郡赫斯利九桥高尔夫俱乐部


In hot and humid weather, these are cooler to sleep on than sheets and pillows. The lightweight form of the ceiling grid shell is reflected in a pool creating an intentionally poetic effect.闷热潮湿的天气，这比床单枕头要凉爽多了。轻质的球面网壳倒映在池塘里，有意营造出诗意。

7. Heydar Aliyev Centre, Baku, Azerbaijan7.阿塞拜疆巴库阿利耶夫中心

The floor, walls and ceilings of the curvaceous auditorium of this cultural centre, form a seamless whole. The effect is magical and truly remarkable, as if the architect, Zaha Hadid has dissolved the normal rules of construction and reinvented their own.弧形礼堂的地板、墙面和天花板和这一华美壮丽的文化中心完美结合。效果如魔幻一般卓尔不凡，好似扎哈·哈迪德瓦解了常规建构规则、自成一格。

8. San Pantalon, Dorsoduro, Venice8.威尼斯多尔索杜罗区圣庞大良教堂

This illusionistic painting, with its thrillingly foreshortened perspectives, is the work of Fumiani.这一魔幻绘画运用透视法缩短视角，属傅米亚尼的作品。
